name: Rolls-Royce Phantom
shortDetails: The price of Rolls-Royce Phantom starts at Rs. 8.99 Cr and goes upto Rs. 10.48 Cr. Rolls-Royce Phantom is offered in 2 variants - the base model of Phantom is Series II and the top variant Rolls-Royce Phantom Extended Wheelbase which comes at a price tag of Rs. 10.48 Cr.
fullDetails: 23 February 2018: Rolls-Royce has revealed the prices of the eighth-generation of the Phantom in India. The CBU unit is priced at Rs 9.5 crores for the standard wheelbase and extends to Rs 11.5 crores for the extended wheelbase version with personalisation options. 2018 Rolls-Royce Phantom is the most expensive car on sale in India currently. Underneath the car is an all-aluminium spaceframe chassis which is loosely related to that of its predecessor. Rolls-Royce says that it is lighter in weight and 30 per cent stiffer than before, traits that make the new Phantom more efficient. The British luxury carmaker has also confirmed that the platform will underpin its first-ever SUV, the Cullinan, and the next generation models of the Wraith, Dawn and the Ghost. Rolls-Royce says that none of its cars, in the future, will have a monocoque construction either.  It is powered by a twin-turbo 6.75-litre V12 engine that produces 571PS of power and 900Nm of torque. The engine is turned to deliver all of its torque at revs as low as 1,700. The eight-speed auto does its job well and although the Phantom VIII weighs over 2.6-tonnes, it can hit 100kmph in 5.4 seconds and clock a top speed of 250kmph. The list of creature comforts is endless. Touted as the car with the world's quietest cabin, its fitted with a 130kg sound insulation system and double laminated glass windows to cut all the unnecessary and harsh road noises. It includes alertness assistant, a 4-camera system with panoramic view, all-round visibility with helicopter view, night vision and vision assist and active cruise control. The list continues with collision and pedestrian warning, cross-traffic warning, lane departure and lane change warning, 7x3 high-resolution heads-up display and a WiFi hotspot.

name: Rolls-Royce Ghost
shortDetails: The price of Rolls-Royce Ghost starts at Rs. 6.95 Cr and goes upto Rs. 7.95 Cr. Rolls-Royce Ghost is offered in 2 variants - the base model of Ghost is V12 and the top variant Rolls-Royce Ghost V12 Extended which comes at a price tag of Rs. 7.95 Cr.
fullDetails: Rolls-Royce Ghost Price: It is priced from Rs 6.95 crore to Rs 7.95 crore (ex-showroom). Rolls-Royce Ghost Engine and Transmission: The Ghost comes with a 6.75-litre twin-turbo V12 engine (571PS/850Nm) paired with a ZF 8-speed automatic transmission. Both Ghost trims can hit 0-100kmph in 4.8 seconds and top out at 250kmph. It also gets an all-wheel drive system. Rolls-Royce Ghost Features: Rolls-Royce has equipped it with a digital driver display, a 1300W audio system, a head-up display, an illuminated dashboard, and an infotainment system. Rolls-Royce Ghost Rivals: The Ghost goes up against the Bentley Flying Spur and the upcoming Mercedes-Maybach S-Class.

name: Rolls-Royce Rolls Royce Wraith
shortDetails: The price of Rolls-Royce Rolls Royce Wraith starts at Rs. 6.22 Cr and goes upto Rs. 7.21 Cr. Rolls-Royce Rolls Royce Wraith is offered in 2 variants - the base model of Rolls Royce Wraith is Coupe and the top variant Rolls-Royce Wraith Black Badge which comes at a price tag of Rs. 7.21 Cr.
fullDetails: May 11, 2015: The philosophy of Rolls-Royce Motor Cars goes hand in hand with the high fashion industry. Celebrating this, the company has revealed its exclusive â€˜Wraith - Inspired by Fashion' edition. This Wraith comes with exquisite and desirable materials enhancing the beauty of this already breathtaking car. Design inspiration comes from different colour palettes, materials and techniques familiar to the fashion industry. Two-tone exterior colour scheme of Andalucian White and Arctic White compliments the signature shoulder-line further accentuated by a new hand-applied feature-line in the selected highlight colour hinting towards the interior of the Wraith. Just like finest clothing, the beauty lines in the extreme attention to detail paid on this vehicle.

name: Rolls-Royce Rolls Royce Dawn
shortDetails: The price of Rolls-Royce Rolls Royce Dawn starts at Rs. 7.30 Cr and goes upto Rs. 7.85 Cr. Rolls-Royce Rolls Royce Dawn is offered in 2 variants - the base model of Rolls Royce Dawn is Convertible and the top variant Rolls-Royce Dawn Black Badge which comes at a price tag of Rs. 7.85 Cr.
fullDetails: June 24, 2016: Rolls-Royce has finally launched its Dawn convertible at Rs 6.25 crore (ex-showroom, India). The powerful RR will be getting the de-tuned engine of the fastest RR ever - the Wraith. Linked to an eight-speed ZF automatic transmission, it's a 6.6-litre turbo-charged V12 motor that belts out a whopping 570PS of max power and peak torque of 780Nm. It does the naught to 100kmph in mere 4.9 seconds. Based on the Wraith platform, it is designed from scratch.

name: Ferrari SF90 Stradale
shortDetails: The price of Ferrari SF90 Stradale starts at Rs. 7.50 Cr and goes upto Rs. 7.50 Cr. Ferrari SF90 Stradale is offered in 1 variants - the base model of SF90 Stradale is Coupe V8 and the top variant Ferrari SF90 Stradale Coupe V8 which comes at a price tag of Rs. 7.50 Cr.

name: Ferrari 812
shortDetails: The price of Ferrari 812 starts at Rs. 5.75 Cr and goes upto Rs. 5.75 Cr. Ferrari 812 is offered in 1 variants - the base model of 812 is GTS and the top variant Ferrari 812 GTS which comes at a price tag of Rs. 5.75 Cr.

name: Lamborghini Huracan EVO
shortDetails: The price of Lamborghini Huracan EVO starts at Rs. 3.21 Cr and goes upto Rs. 4.99 Cr. Lamborghini Huracan EVO is offered in 5 variants - the base model of Huracan EVO is RWD and the top variant Lamborghini Huracan EVO STO which comes at a price tag of Rs. 4.99 Cr.

name: Ferrari Roma
shortDetails: The price of Ferrari Roma starts at Rs. 3.76 Cr and goes upto Rs. 3.76 Cr. Ferrari Roma is offered in 1 variants - the base model of Roma is Coupe V8 and the top variant Ferrari Roma Coupe V8 which comes at a price tag of Rs. 3.76 Cr.

name: BMW X7
shortDetails: The price of BMW X7 starts at Rs. 1.06 Cr and goes upto Rs. 1.73 Cr. BMW X7 is offered in 3 variants - the base model of X7 is xDrive30d DPE Signature and the top variant BMW X7 M50d which comes at a price tag of Rs. 1.73 Cr

name: Jaguar I-Pace
shortDetails: The price of Jaguar I-Pace starts at Rs. 1.05 Cr and goes upto Rs. 1.12 Cr. Jaguar I-Pace is offered in 3 variants - the base model of I-Pace is S and the top variant Jaguar I-Pace HSE which comes at a price tag of Rs. 1.12 Cr.
